title: [Large-Scale] Needs Analysis and Design Thinking Workshop for Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design concepts and curriculum development experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design competencies for science curriculum development

learning_goals: Learners can systematically perform a needs analysis procedure in a given educational scenario.
Learners can derive educational strategies through design conjecturing based on limited information.
Learners can verify and improve design decisions through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
